question: If <katex>$Z_1$</katex> and <katex>$Z_2$</katex> are two non-zero complex numbers, then which of the following is not true?
explanation: Therefore, the statement <katex>$|Z_1 + Z_2| \ge |Z_1| + |Z_2|$</katex> is generally false (it holds only if the complex numbers have the same argument).
